Title:
Three new species of Incrucipulum (Lachnaceae, Helotiales,
Ascomycota) from Japan
Keywords:
Incrucipulum foliicola, Incrucipulum hakonechloae-macrae,
Incrucipulum pseudosulphurellum, mycobiota, taxonomy
Abstract:
Three new species of Incrucipulum were described from
Japan: I. foliicola and I. pseudosulphurellum on Myrica gale subsp.
tomentosa and I. hakonechloae-macrae on Hakonechloa macra. Disposition
to Incrucipulum was justified by molecular phylogenetic analysis based
on ITS-5.8S, LSU and RPB2 regions, and monophyly of Incrucipulum was
also confirmed. Some apomorphic characters of Incrucipulum were
identified. By addition of three new species, the genus Incrucipulum now
contains 13 species.
